titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and citizens of London at Bow-Church on the 29th of May 1682.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Benjamin, 1642-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Written by Benjamin Calamy. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
